description: These nutritious Greek-inspired vegan meatballs are super filling and perfect served with pita breads and hummus.
name: Greek-Style Quinoa & Bean Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Spread the black beans on a baking tray and bake for 10 minutes, until slightly dried and cracked. Leave the oven on.

Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onion for 3-4 minutes. Add the garlic and oregano and cook for 1 minute. Tip into a food processor along with the cooked quinoa, black beans, 60g of flour, tahini, soy sauce and lemon zest and pulse until smooth.
Using your hands, roll the mix into 20 meatballs. Place on a plate and chill for 20 minutes in the fridge. Spread the rest of the flour on a plate and toss each meatball in it to lightly coat.
Heat the rest of the oil in the pan and cook the meatballs for 4-5 minutes, tossing to brown all over. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes.
